sn36.8:4.1: Ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā vesāliyaṃ viharati mahāvane kūṭāgārasālāyaṃ.
sn36.8:4.2: Atha kho bhagavā sāyanhasamayaṃ paṭisallānā vuṭṭhito yena gilānasālā tenupasaṅkami;
sn36.8:6.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kāye kāyānupassī viharati ātāpī sampajāno satimā, vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassaṃ;
sn36.8:6.5: dhammesu dhammānupassī viharati ātāpī sampajāno satimā, vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassaṃ.
sn36.8:6.6: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sato hoti.
sn36.8:7.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu abhikkante paṭikkante sampajānakārī hoti … pe …
sn36.8:7.4: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sampajāno hoti.
sn36.8:7.5: Sato, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sampajāno kālaṃ āgameyya.
sn36.8:8.1: Tassa ce, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno evaṃ satassa sampajānassa appamattassa ātāpino pahitattassa viharato uppajjati sukhā vedanā.
sn36.8:8.4: sā ca kho paṭicca, no appaṭicca.
sn36.8:8.7: Ayaṃ kho pana phasso anicco saṅkhato paṭiccasamuppanno.
sn36.8:8.8: Aniccaṃ kho pana saṅkhataṃ paṭiccasamuppannaṃ phassaṃ paṭicca uppannā sukhā vedanā kuto niccā bhavissatī’ti.
sn36.8:8.9: So phasse ca sukhāya ca vedanāya aniccānupassī viharati, vayānupassī viharati, virāgānupassī viharati, nirodhānupassī viharati, paṭinissaggānupassī viharati.
sn36.8:8.10: Tassa phasse ca sukhāya ca vedanāya aniccānupassino viharato, vayānupassino viharato, virāgānupassino viharato, nirodhānupassino viharato, paṭinissaggānupassino viharato yo phasse ca sukhāya ca vedanāya rāgānusayo, so pahīyati.
sn36.8:9.1: Tassa ce, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno evaṃ satassa … pe …
sn36.8:9.6: sā ca kho paṭicca, no appaṭicca.
sn36.8:9.10: Kāyassa bhedā uddhaṃ jīvitapariyādānā idheva sabbavedayitāni anabhinanditāni sītībhavissantī’ti pajānāti.
sn36.8:10.1: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, telañca paṭicca vaṭṭiñca paṭicca telappadīpo jhāyeyya, tasseva telassa ca vaṭṭiyā ca pariyādānā anāhāro nibbāyeyya;
sn36.8:10.2: evameva kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kāyapariyantikaṃ vedanaṃ vedayamāno ‘kāyapariyantikaṃ vedanaṃ vedayāmī’ti pajānāti.
sn36.8:10.3: Jīvitapariyantikaṃ vedanaṃ vedayamāno ‘jīvitapariyantikaṃ vedanaṃ vedayāmī’ti pajānāti.
sn36.8:10.4: ‘Kāyassa bhedā uddhaṃ jīvitapariyādānā idheva sabbavedayitāni anabhinanditāni sītībhavissantī’ti pajānātī”ti.
